name: L.S.D.s --- AKA: Love-Sucking Demons
description:
When  Special Agent Silver Fox spies an alien tormenting his main squeeze, he turns his reconnaissance assignment into a personal vendetta.

Set in the backdrop of the Stonewall Riots, this retro 1960's sci-fi thriller in the stylings of Jean-Luc Godard's Alphaville definitively answers the question, "Is surf rock still the bee's knees???"
